name: Tiring Golf
description:
A simple golfing game with a twist - every time you hit the ball you get more and more tired, which delays the controls and makes the game harder.

In order to wake up (and restore the difficulty) you might want to fall into the void on purpose. You know, losing can be good sometimes

Controls
  • Use Right Mouse Button to Rotate the Camera
  • Use Left Mouse Button to select strength/angle/hit the ball
